name: France
overview: Currently France has an emphasis on nuclear power.  This is reflected in the game by a larger supply of uranium and faster access to the first nuclear power plant. The capital city of Paris is the largest metropolis in the country. Paris is represented as a “triple” city, which makes it an interesting target for power plant owners, but too much emphasis on Paris may be an incautious player's undoing!

preparation.content: Place 3 coal on spaces 1 to 8; 3 oil on spaces 3 to 8; and 3 garbage on spaces 7 and 8; 1 uranium on each of the spaces 5 through 16.
Remove power plant 13 from the game.

After setting out the initial 8 power plants, set power plant 11 and the step 3 card aside. Shuffle the remaining cards and place them face down next to the board. Place the step 3 card face down under the supply and power plant 11 face down on top of the supply.

notes.content: We recommend choosing the central France region (containing Paris) as one of regions included in the game.
